item.title: This Cocaine Makes Me Feel Like Im On This Song (ver 4) Tab

comments.value: good tab, i think you labeled some chords wrong though
Great tab. I think i would have done it "Drop C" and brought everything up a half step, but this is fine too. great job.

THIS COCAINE MAKES ME FEEL LIKE I'M ON THIS SONG
As recorded by System Of A Down
(On the 2005 album Mezmerize)
Words and Music by Daron Malakain and Serj Tankian

||-6-6-------------------0-4-7-|-6-----------*||
||-6-6---------------------4-7-|-6-----------*||
||-6-6---------------------4-7-|-6-----------*||

 Tab Legend
------------
   h    - Hammer On
   p    - Pull Off
   b(n) - Bend '(n) is fret to bend to'
  pb(n) - Pre Bend
   ~    - Vibrato
s or /\ - Legato Slide
   S    - Shift Slide
 / or \ - Slide in or out
   tr   - Trill
   T    - Tapping
  harm. - Natural Harmonic
  P.H.  - Pinch Harmonic
  n(n)  - Harp Harmonic
  P.S.  - Pick Scrape
   X    - Dead Note
  PM-|  - Palm Muting
   TR   - Tremolo Picking
  \n/   - Tremolo Bar Dip
  \n    - Tremolo Bar Down
  /n    - Tremolo Bar Up
  /n\   - Tremolo Bar Inverted Dip
   V    - Vibrate Bar Scoop
   v    - Upstroke
   n    - Downstroke
  (5)   - Note Held From Previous
   =    - Connector for Hammer/Pulls/Bends etc.
   <    - Volume Swell
   >    - Accent
   *    - (Appears After A Note) read the margin box entitled * for details


 Musical Notation
------------------
  W = Whole; H = Half; Q = Quarter; E = 8th; S = 16th; T = 32nd; X = 64th
  . = Dotted Note; +  = Connector for Notes; 8/s8 or 16/s16 s = swing 
  Lower Case notes are staccato (1/2 duration) 
  Musical Notation will always appear directly over the fret it represents.
  Musical Notation with no fret symbolizes a rest.
  
 Misc.
-------
  |   - Bar
  :   - Bar (freetime)
  ||  - Double Bar
 ||o  - Open Repeat
 o||  - Closed Repeat
 *||  - Double Bar (ending) 
 |1.  - Alternate Endings
  $   - Segno
  &   - Coda
  $$  - Segno Segno
  &&  - Dbl. Coda
 Fine - "Fine"
 
 D.S. al Coda - Go Back to the Segno (or double segno [if marked D.S.S.]) and play until the Coda (or Dbl. Coda [If marked Dbl. Coda])
 8va-|  - Played one octave higher then written
 15ma-| - Played two ocataves higher then written
